mapper.select: select tmp.month, sum(costTotalAmount) as costTotalAmount, sum(taxTotalAmount) as taxTotalAmount from ( select t.account_no, date_format(t.trade_time, '%Y%m') as month, t.trade_type, case when t.trade_type = #{serviceCostType} then t.profit * -1 else 0 end as costTotalAmount, case when t.trade_type = #{taxCostType} then t.profit * -1 else 0 end as taxTotalAmount from uctp_merchant_profit t where t.account_no = #{accountNo} and t.trade_type in (#{serviceCostType}, #{taxCostType}) and t.trade_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) tmp group by tmp.month

select ID, ACCOUNT_NO, null as merchant_id, null as merchant_name, null as tel_no, p.profit * -1 as amount, ( select a.profit from uctp_merchant_account a where a.account_no = p.account_no) as balance_amount, p.bank_no, p.bank_name, null as bank_of_deposit from uctp_merchant_profit p where p.id = #{id}
select t.file_id as fileId, t.file_url as fileUrl from uctp_merchant_profit_invoice t where t.profit_id = #{profitId}

select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as idx, tmp2.* from ( select @rownum := 0) nt, ( select p.contract_no, '利润提取' as category, null as vehicle_receipt_amount, null as car_sales_amount, null as fee_total_amount, p.profit as amount, p.trade_time as trade_time from uctp_merchant_profit p where p.account_no = #{accountNo} and p.trade_type = '10101002' union all select tmp.contract_no, '利润划入' as category, sum(tmp.vehicle_receipt_amount) as vehicle_receipt_amount, sum(tmp.car_sales_amount) as car_sales_amount, sum(tmp.fee_total_amount) as fee_total_amount, sum(tmp.amount) as amount, min(tmp.trade_time) as trade_time from ( select p.contract_no, null as vehicle_receipt_amount, case when p.trade_type = '10101001' then p.profit else 0 end as car_sales_amount, case when p.trade_type in ('10101004', '10101005') then p.profit else 0 end as fee_total_amount, case when p.trade_type = '10101001' then p.profit_balance else 0 end as amount, p.trade_time as trade_time from uctp_merchant_profit p where p.account_no = #{accountNo} and p.trade_type != '10101002') tmp group by tmp.contract_no) tmp2 order by tmp2.trade_time desc
